name: Death Dungeon (itch)
description:
You and a couple of friends (up to 4) decide that it was a good idea to fight to the death in an old dungeon mansion thingy. Only one of you will make it out alive and who will it be? 


Team: 
Johan Backman Wiström: Graphics & Code (SU17A) 
Casper Lidén: Code & Sound  (SU17A) 
Andy Pålsson: Code 
Vilgot Svärd: Code
